summary: An email dated August 12, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein, referencing a 'S/W and Psych Ops' and an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The email appears to be a forwarded message or notification concerning Epstein's status or conditions at the facility.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, identified by his inmate registration number 73618-054, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein's Status at MCC
events.description: An email is sent referencing Jeffrey Epstein, his registration number, and mentions 'S/W and Psych Ops' in relation to an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated August 12, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019 and before his death in August 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is referenced by his federal inmate registration number: 73618-054.
The email mentions 'S/W and Psych Ops' (likely Security/Watch and Psychological Operations) in connection with an Associate Warden at the MCC New York facility.
The correspondence involves the email address NYM/AW-Programs-@bop.gov, which is associated with the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) programs at the MCC.
